HI, my name is Sowunmi Oluwamayowa

I am a frontend developer and i am very passionate about creating beautiful websites your users will love.

My name is Sowunmi Oluwamayowa, I am a recent graduate from the Federal Polytechnic Ilaro, where I earned my degree in Computer Science. During my time in the polytechnic, I was a member of Programmers' Hub and i served as the vice president of 2021/2022 academic session. I am also a self-taught web developer. I have always been fascinated by the power of the internet and enjoy using my skills to build websites that are both functional and visually appealing. I am also passionate about technology and am always looking to learn new programming languages and development tools.In my free time, I enjoy graphics designing with adobe photoshop, watching movies and playing video games.

FULLSTACK

ALUMNI FEE PAYMENT PORTAL

This project was created to ease the stress of students of the federal polytechnic ilaro in the payment of their alumni fee after they have completed their ND or HND programme.

REACT QUOTEBANK

React QuoteBank is a web app that is developed with react js, tailwindcss and random quotes api. it generates random quotes from the aoi when the user clicks a submit button
